problem_names:
lemmas WTrt_induct = WTrt_WTrts.induct [split_format (complete)]
  and WTrt_inducts = WTrt_WTrts.inducts [split_format (complete)]
lemma [iff]: "(P,E,h \<turnstile> e#es [:] T#Ts) = (P,E,h \<turnstile> e : T \<and> P,E,h \<turnstile> es [:] Ts)"

lemma [iff]: "(P,E,h \<turnstile> (e#es) [:] Ts) =
  (\<exists>U Us. Ts = U#Us \<and> P,E,h \<turnstile> e : U \<and> P,E,h \<turnstile> es [:] Us)"

lemma [simp]: "\<forall>Ts. (P,E,h \<turnstile> es\<^sub>1 @ es\<^sub>2 [:] Ts) =
  (\<exists>Ts\<^sub>1 Ts\<^sub>2. Ts = Ts\<^sub>1 @ Ts\<^sub>2 \<and> P,E,h \<turnstile> es\<^sub>1 [:] Ts\<^sub>1 & P,E,h \<turnstile> es\<^sub>2[:]Ts\<^sub>2)"
lemma [iff]: "P,E,h \<turnstile> Val v : T = (typeof\<^bsub>h\<^esub> v = Some T)"
lemma [iff]: "P,E,h \<turnstile> Var v : T = (E v = Some T)"
lemma [iff]: "P,E,h \<turnstile> e\<^sub>1;;e\<^sub>2 : T\<^sub>2 = (\<exists>T\<^sub>1. P,E,h \<turnstile> e\<^sub>1:T\<^sub>1 \<and> P,E,h \<turnstile> e\<^sub>2:T\<^sub>2)"

lemma WTrts_Val[simp]:
 "\<And>Ts. (P,E,h \<turnstile> map Val vs [:] Ts) = (map (typeof\<^bsub>h\<^esub>) vs = map Some Ts)"
lemma WTrts_same_length: "\<And>Ts. P,E,h \<turnstile> es [:] Ts \<Longrightarrow> length es = length Ts"

lemma WTrt_env_mono:
  "P,E,h \<turnstile> e : T \<Longrightarrow> (\<And>E'. E \<subseteq>\<^sub>m E' \<Longrightarrow> P,E',h \<turnstile> e : T)" and
  "P,E,h \<turnstile> es [:] Ts \<Longrightarrow> (\<And>E'. E \<subseteq>\<^sub>m E' \<Longrightarrow> P,E',h \<turnstile> es [:] Ts)"

lemma WTrt_hext_mono: "P,E,h \<turnstile> e : T \<Longrightarrow> h \<unlhd> h' \<Longrightarrow> P,E,h' \<turnstile> e : T"
and WTrts_hext_mono: "P,E,h \<turnstile> es [:] Ts \<Longrightarrow> h \<unlhd> h' \<Longrightarrow> P,E,h' \<turnstile> es [:] Ts"

lemma WT_implies_WTrt: "P,E \<turnstile> e :: T \<Longrightarrow> P,E,h \<turnstile> e : T"
and WTs_implies_WTrts: "P,E \<turnstile> es [::] Ts \<Longrightarrow> P,E,h \<turnstile> es [:] Ts"
translations:
lemmas WTrt_induct = WTrt_WTrts.induct [split_format (complete)]
  and WTrt_inducts = WTrt_WTrts.inducts [split_format (complete)]

proof (prove)
goal (2 subgoals):
 1. P,E,h \<turnstile> [] [:] Ts \<Longrightarrow> Ts = []
 2. Ts = [] \<Longrightarrow> P,E,h \<turnstile> [] [:] Ts
lemma [iff]: "(P,E,h \<turnstile> e#es [:] T#Ts) = (P,E,h \<turnstile> e : T \<and> P,E,h \<turnstile> es [:] Ts)"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. (P,E,h \<turnstile> e # es [:] T # Ts) =
    (P,E,h \<turnstile> e : T \<and> P,E,h \<turnstile> es [:] Ts)

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. (P,E,h \<turnstile> e # es [:] T # Ts) =
    (P,E,h \<turnstile> e : T \<and> P,E,h \<turnstile> es [:] Ts)

proof (prove)
goal (2 subgoals):
 1. P,E,h \<turnstile> e # es [:] T # Ts \<Longrightarrow>
    P,E,h \<turnstile> e : T \<and> P,E,h \<turnstile> es [:] Ts
 2. P,E,h \<turnstile> e : T \<and>
    P,E,h \<turnstile> es [:] Ts \<Longrightarrow>
    P,E,h \<turnstile> e # es [:] T # Ts

lemma [iff]: "(P,E,h \<turnstile> (e#es) [:] Ts) =
  (\<exists>U Us. Ts = U#Us \<and> P,E,h \<turnstile> e : U \<and> P,E,h \<turnstile> es [:] Us)"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. (P,E,h \<turnstile> e # es [:] Ts) =
    (\<exists>U Us.
        Ts = U # Us \<and>
        P,E,h \<turnstile> e : U \<and> P,E,h \<turnstile> es [:] Us)

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. (P,E,h \<turnstile> e # es [:] Ts) =
    (\<exists>U Us.
        Ts = U # Us \<and>
        P,E,h \<turnstile> e : U \<and> P,E,h \<turnstile> es [:] Us)

proof (prove)
goal (2 subgoals):
 1. P,E,h \<turnstile> e # es [:] Ts \<Longrightarrow>
    \<exists>U Us.
       Ts = U # Us \<and>
       P,E,h \<turnstile> e : U \<and> P,E,h \<turnstile> es [:] Us
 2. \<exists>U Us.
       Ts = U # Us \<and>
       P,E,h \<turnstile> e : U \<and>
       P,E,h \<turnstile> es [:] Us \<Longrightarrow>
    P,E,h \<turnstile> e # es [:] Ts

lemma [simp]: "\<forall>Ts. (P,E,h \<turnstile> es\<^sub>1 @ es\<^sub>2 [:] Ts) =
  (\<exists>Ts\<^sub>1 Ts\<^sub>2. Ts = Ts\<^sub>1 @ Ts\<^sub>2 \<and> P,E,h \<turnstile> es\<^sub>1 [:] Ts\<^sub>1 & P,E,h \<turnstile> es\<^sub>2[:]Ts\<^sub>2)"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<forall>Ts.
       (P,E,h \<turnstile> es\<^sub>1 @ es\<^sub>2 [:] Ts) =
       (\<exists>Ts\<^sub>1 Ts\<^sub>2.
           Ts = Ts\<^sub>1 @ Ts\<^sub>2 \<and>
           P,E,h \<turnstile> es\<^sub>1 [:] Ts\<^sub>1 \<and>
           P,E,h \<turnstile> es\<^sub>2 [:] Ts\<^sub>2)

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<forall>Ts.
       (P,E,h \<turnstile> es\<^sub>1 @ es\<^sub>2 [:] Ts) =
       (\<exists>Ts\<^sub>1 Ts\<^sub>2.
           Ts = Ts\<^sub>1 @ Ts\<^sub>2 \<and>
           P,E,h \<turnstile> es\<^sub>1 [:] Ts\<^sub>1 \<and>
           P,E,h \<turnstile> es\<^sub>2 [:] Ts\<^sub>2)

proof (prove)
goal (2 subgoals):
 1. \<forall>Ts.
       (P,E,h \<turnstile> [] @ es\<^sub>2 [:] Ts) =
       (\<exists>Ts\<^sub>1 Ts\<^sub>2.
           Ts = Ts\<^sub>1 @ Ts\<^sub>2 \<and>
           P,E,h \<turnstile> [] [:] Ts\<^sub>1 \<and>
           P,E,h \<turnstile> es\<^sub>2 [:] Ts\<^sub>2)
 2. \<And>a list.
       \<forall>Ts.
          (P,E,h \<turnstile> list @ es\<^sub>2 [:] Ts) =
          (\<exists>Ts\<^sub>1 Ts\<^sub>2.
              Ts = Ts\<^sub>1 @ Ts\<^sub>2 \<and>
              P,E,h \<turnstile> list [:] Ts\<^sub>1 \<and>
              P,E,h \<turnstile> es\<^sub>2 [:] Ts\<^sub>2) \<Longrightarrow>
       \<forall>Ts.
          (P,E,h \<turnstile> (a # list) @ es\<^sub>2 [:] Ts) =
          (\<exists>Ts\<^sub>1 Ts\<^sub>2.
              Ts = Ts\<^sub>1 @ Ts\<^sub>2 \<and>
              P,E,h \<turnstile> a # list [:] Ts\<^sub>1 \<and>
              P,E,h \<turnstile> es\<^sub>2 [:] Ts\<^sub>2)

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<And>a list.
       \<forall>Ts.
          (P,E,h \<turnstile> list @ es\<^sub>2 [:] Ts) =
          (\<exists>Ts\<^sub>1 Ts\<^sub>2.
              Ts = Ts\<^sub>1 @ Ts\<^sub>2 \<and>
              P,E,h \<turnstile> list [:] Ts\<^sub>1 \<and>
              P,E,h \<turnstile> es\<^sub>2 [:] Ts\<^sub>2) \<Longrightarrow>
       \<forall>Ts.
          (P,E,h \<turnstile> (a # list) @ es\<^sub>2 [:] Ts) =
          (\<exists>Ts\<^sub>1 Ts\<^sub>2.
              Ts = Ts\<^sub>1 @ Ts\<^sub>2 \<and>
              P,E,h \<turnstile> a # list [:] Ts\<^sub>1 \<and>
              P,E,h \<turnstile> es\<^sub>2 [:] Ts\<^sub>2)

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<And>a list Ts.
       \<forall>Ts.
          (P,E,h \<turnstile> list @ es\<^sub>2 [:] Ts) =
          (\<exists>Ts\<^sub>1 Ts\<^sub>2.
              Ts = Ts\<^sub>1 @ Ts\<^sub>2 \<and>
              P,E,h \<turnstile> list [:] Ts\<^sub>1 \<and>
              P,E,h \<turnstile> es\<^sub>2 [:] Ts\<^sub>2) \<Longrightarrow>
       (\<exists>U Us.
           Ts = U # Us \<and>
           P,E,h \<turnstile> a : U \<and>
           (\<exists>Ts\<^sub>1 Ts\<^sub>2.
               Us = Ts\<^sub>1 @ Ts\<^sub>2 \<and>
               P,E,h \<turnstile> list [:] Ts\<^sub>1 \<and>
               P,E,h \<turnstile> es\<^sub>2 [:] Ts\<^sub>2)) =
       (\<exists>Ts\<^sub>1 Ts\<^sub>2.
           Ts = Ts\<^sub>1 @ Ts\<^sub>2 \<and>
           (\<exists>U Us.
               Ts\<^sub>1 = U # Us \<and>
               P,E,h \<turnstile> a : U \<and>
               P,E,h \<turnstile> list [:] Us) \<and>
           P,E,h \<turnstile> es\<^sub>2 [:] Ts\<^sub>2)

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<And>a list Ts.
       (\<exists>U Us.
           Ts = U # Us \<and>
           P,E,h \<turnstile> a : U \<and>
           (\<exists>Ts\<^sub>1 Ts\<^sub>2.
               Us = Ts\<^sub>1 @ Ts\<^sub>2 \<and>
               P,E,h \<turnstile> list [:] Ts\<^sub>1 \<and>
               P,E,h \<turnstile> es\<^sub>2 [:] Ts\<^sub>2)) =
       (\<exists>Ts\<^sub>1 Ts\<^sub>2.
           Ts = Ts\<^sub>1 @ Ts\<^sub>2 \<and>
           (\<exists>U Us.
               Ts\<^sub>1 = U # Us \<and>
               P,E,h \<turnstile> a : U \<and>
               P,E,h \<turnstile> list [:] Us) \<and>
           P,E,h \<turnstile> es\<^sub>2 [:] Ts\<^sub>2)

proof (prove)
goal (2 subgoals):
 1. \<And>a list Ts.
       \<exists>U Us.
          Ts = U # Us \<and>
          P,E,h \<turnstile> a : U \<and>
          (\<exists>Ts\<^sub>1 Ts\<^sub>2.
              Us = Ts\<^sub>1 @ Ts\<^sub>2 \<and>
              P,E,h \<turnstile> list [:] Ts\<^sub>1 \<and>
              P,E,h \<turnstile> es\<^sub>2 [:] Ts\<^sub>2) \<Longrightarrow>
       \<exists>Ts\<^sub>1 Ts\<^sub>2.
          Ts = Ts\<^sub>1 @ Ts\<^sub>2 \<and>
          (\<exists>U Us.
              Ts\<^sub>1 = U # Us \<and>
              P,E,h \<turnstile> a : U \<and>
              P,E,h \<turnstile> list [:] Us) \<and>
          P,E,h \<turnstile> es\<^sub>2 [:] Ts\<^sub>2
 2. \<And>a list Ts.
       \<exists>Ts\<^sub>1 Ts\<^sub>2.
          Ts = Ts\<^sub>1 @ Ts\<^sub>2 \<and>
          (\<exists>U Us.
              Ts\<^sub>1 = U # Us \<and>
              P,E,h \<turnstile> a : U \<and>
              P,E,h \<turnstile> list [:] Us) \<and>
          P,E,h \<turnstile> es\<^sub>2 [:] Ts\<^sub>2 \<Longrightarrow>
       \<exists>U Us.
          Ts = U # Us \<and>
          P,E,h \<turnstile> a : U \<and>
          (\<exists>Ts\<^sub>1 Ts\<^sub>2.
              Us = Ts\<^sub>1 @ Ts\<^sub>2 \<and>
              P,E,h \<turnstile> list [:] Ts\<^sub>1 \<and>
              P,E,h \<turnstile> es\<^sub>2 [:] Ts\<^sub>2)

proof (prove)
goal (2 subgoals):
 1. \<And>a list U Ts\<^sub>1 Ts\<^sub>2.
       \<lbrakk>P,E,h \<turnstile> a : U;
        P,E,h \<turnstile> list [:] Ts\<^sub>1;
        P,E,h \<turnstile> es\<^sub>2 [:] Ts\<^sub>2\<rbrakk>
       \<Longrightarrow> \<exists>Ts\<^sub>1' Ts\<^sub>2'.
                            U # Ts\<^sub>1 @ Ts\<^sub>2 =
                            Ts\<^sub>1' @ Ts\<^sub>2' \<and>
                            (\<exists>U Us.
                                Ts\<^sub>1' = U # Us \<and>
                                P,E,h \<turnstile> a : U \<and>
                                P,E,h \<turnstile> list [:] Us) \<and>
                            P,E,h \<turnstile> es\<^sub>2 [:] Ts\<^sub>2'
 2. \<And>a list Ts.
       \<exists>Ts\<^sub>1 Ts\<^sub>2.
          Ts = Ts\<^sub>1 @ Ts\<^sub>2 \<and>
          (\<exists>U Us.
              Ts\<^sub>1 = U # Us \<and>
              P,E,h \<turnstile> a : U \<and>
              P,E,h \<turnstile> list [:] Us) \<and>
          P,E,h \<turnstile> es\<^sub>2 [:] Ts\<^sub>2 \<Longrightarrow>
       \<exists>U Us.
          Ts = U # Us \<and>
          P,E,h \<turnstile> a : U \<and>
          (\<exists>Ts\<^sub>1 Ts\<^sub>2.
              Us = Ts\<^sub>1 @ Ts\<^sub>2 \<and>
              P,E,h \<turnstile> list [:] Ts\<^sub>1 \<and>
              P,E,h \<turnstile> es\<^sub>2 [:] Ts\<^sub>2)

proof (prove)
goal (2 subgoals):
 1. \<And>a list U Ts\<^sub>1 Ts\<^sub>2.
       \<lbrakk>P,E,h \<turnstile> a : U;
        P,E,h \<turnstile> list [:] Ts\<^sub>1;
        P,E,h \<turnstile> es\<^sub>2 [:] Ts\<^sub>2\<rbrakk>
       \<Longrightarrow> U # Ts\<^sub>1 @ Ts\<^sub>2 =
                         ?Ts\<^sub>119 a list U Ts\<^sub>1 Ts\<^sub>2 @
                         ?Ts\<^sub>221 a list U Ts\<^sub>1 Ts\<^sub>2 \<and>
                         (\<exists>Ua Us.
                             ?Ts\<^sub>119 a list U Ts\<^sub>1 Ts\<^sub>2 =
                             Ua # Us \<and>
                             P,E,h \<turnstile> a : Ua \<and>
                             P,E,h \<turnstile> list [:] Us) \<and>
                         P,E,h \<turnstile> es\<^sub>2 [:] ?Ts\<^sub>221 a
                      list U Ts\<^sub>1 Ts\<^sub>2
 2. \<And>a list Ts.
       \<exists>Ts\<^sub>1 Ts\<^sub>2.
          Ts = Ts\<^sub>1 @ Ts\<^sub>2 \<and>
          (\<exists>U Us.
              Ts\<^sub>1 = U # Us \<and>
              P,E,h \<turnstile> a : U \<and>
              P,E,h \<turnstile> list [:] Us) \<and>
          P,E,h \<turnstile> es\<^sub>2 [:] Ts\<^sub>2 \<Longrightarrow>
       \<exists>U Us.
          Ts = U # Us \<and>
          P,E,h \<turnstile> a : U \<and>
          (\<exists>Ts\<^sub>1 Ts\<^sub>2.
              Us = Ts\<^sub>1 @ Ts\<^sub>2 \<and>
              P,E,h \<turnstile> list [:] Ts\<^sub>1 \<and>
              P,E,h \<turnstile> es\<^sub>2 [:] Ts\<^sub>2)

proof (prove)
goal (3 subgoals):
 1. \<And>a list U Ts\<^sub>1 Ts\<^sub>2.
       \<lbrakk>P,E,h \<turnstile> a : U;
        P,E,h \<turnstile> list [:] Ts\<^sub>1;
        P,E,h \<turnstile> es\<^sub>2 [:] Ts\<^sub>2\<rbrakk>
       \<Longrightarrow> U # Ts\<^sub>1 @ Ts\<^sub>2 =
                         ?Ts\<^sub>119 a list U Ts\<^sub>1 Ts\<^sub>2 @
                         ?Ts\<^sub>221 a list U Ts\<^sub>1 Ts\<^sub>2
 2. \<And>a list U Ts\<^sub>1 Ts\<^sub>2.
       \<lbrakk>P,E,h \<turnstile> a : U;
        P,E,h \<turnstile> list [:] Ts\<^sub>1;
        P,E,h \<turnstile> es\<^sub>2 [:] Ts\<^sub>2\<rbrakk>
       \<Longrightarrow> (\<exists>Ua Us.
                             ?Ts\<^sub>119 a list U Ts\<^sub>1 Ts\<^sub>2 =
                             Ua # Us \<and>
                             P,E,h \<turnstile> a : Ua \<and>
                             P,E,h \<turnstile> list [:] Us) \<and>
                         P,E,h \<turnstile> es\<^sub>2 [:] ?Ts\<^sub>221 a
                      list U Ts\<^sub>1 Ts\<^sub>2
 3. \<And>a list Ts.
       \<exists>Ts\<^sub>1 Ts\<^sub>2.
          Ts = Ts\<^sub>1 @ Ts\<^sub>2 \<and>
          (\<exists>U Us.
              Ts\<^sub>1 = U # Us \<and>
              P,E,h \<turnstile> a : U \<and>
              P,E,h \<turnstile> list [:] Us) \<and>
          P,E,h \<turnstile> es\<^sub>2 [:] Ts\<^sub>2 \<Longrightarrow>
       \<exists>U Us.
          Ts = U # Us \<and>
          P,E,h \<turnstile> a : U \<and>
          (\<exists>Ts\<^sub>1 Ts\<^sub>2.
              Us = Ts\<^sub>1 @ Ts\<^sub>2 \<and>
              P,E,h \<turnstile> list [:] Ts\<^sub>1 \<and>
              P,E,h \<turnstile> es\<^sub>2 [:] Ts\<^sub>2)

proof (prove)
goal (3 subgoals):
 1. \<And>a list U Ts\<^sub>1 Ts\<^sub>2.
       \<lbrakk>P,E,h \<turnstile> a : U;
        P,E,h \<turnstile> list [:] Ts\<^sub>1;
        P,E,h \<turnstile> es\<^sub>2 [:] Ts\<^sub>2\<rbrakk>
       \<Longrightarrow> (\<exists>Ua Us.
                             ?Ts\<^sub>119 a list U Ts\<^sub>1 Ts\<^sub>2 =
                             Ua # Us \<and>
                             P,E,h \<turnstile> a : Ua \<and>
                             P,E,h \<turnstile> list [:] Us) \<and>
                         P,E,h \<turnstile> es\<^sub>2 [:] ?Ts\<^sub>221 a
                      list U Ts\<^sub>1 Ts\<^sub>2
 2. \<And>a list U Ts\<^sub>1 Ts\<^sub>2.
       \<lbrakk>P,E,h \<turnstile> a : U;
        P,E,h \<turnstile> list [:] Ts\<^sub>1;
        P,E,h \<turnstile> es\<^sub>2 [:] Ts\<^sub>2\<rbrakk>
       \<Longrightarrow> U # Ts\<^sub>1 @ Ts\<^sub>2 =
                         ?Ts\<^sub>119 a list U Ts\<^sub>1 Ts\<^sub>2 @
                         ?Ts\<^sub>221 a list U Ts\<^sub>1 Ts\<^sub>2
 3. \<And>a list Ts.
       \<exists>Ts\<^sub>1 Ts\<^sub>2.
          Ts = Ts\<^sub>1 @ Ts\<^sub>2 \<and>
          (\<exists>U Us.
              Ts\<^sub>1 = U # Us \<and>
              P,E,h \<turnstile> a : U \<and>
              P,E,h \<turnstile> list [:] Us) \<and>
          P,E,h \<turnstile> es\<^sub>2 [:] Ts\<^sub>2 \<Longrightarrow>
       \<exists>U Us.
          Ts = U # Us \<and>
          P,E,h \<turnstile> a : U \<and>
          (\<exists>Ts\<^sub>1 Ts\<^sub>2.
              Us = Ts\<^sub>1 @ Ts\<^sub>2 \<and>
              P,E,h \<turnstile> list [:] Ts\<^sub>1 \<and>
              P,E,h \<turnstile> es\<^sub>2 [:] Ts\<^sub>2)

proof (prove)
goal (2 subgoals):
 1. \<And>a list U Ts\<^sub>1 Ts\<^sub>2.
       \<lbrakk>P,E,h \<turnstile> a : U;
        P,E,h \<turnstile> list [:] Ts\<^sub>1;
        P,E,h \<turnstile> es\<^sub>2 [:] Ts\<^sub>2\<rbrakk>
       \<Longrightarrow> U # Ts\<^sub>1 @ Ts\<^sub>2 =
                         (U # Ts\<^sub>1) @ Ts\<^sub>2
 2. \<And>a list Ts.
       \<exists>Ts\<^sub>1 Ts\<^sub>2.
          Ts = Ts\<^sub>1 @ Ts\<^sub>2 \<and>
          (\<exists>U Us.
              Ts\<^sub>1 = U # Us \<and>
              P,E,h \<turnstile> a : U \<and>
              P,E,h \<turnstile> list [:] Us) \<and>
          P,E,h \<turnstile> es\<^sub>2 [:] Ts\<^sub>2 \<Longrightarrow>
       \<exists>U Us.
          Ts = U # Us \<and>
          P,E,h \<turnstile> a : U \<and>
          (\<exists>Ts\<^sub>1 Ts\<^sub>2.
              Us = Ts\<^sub>1 @ Ts\<^sub>2 \<and>
              P,E,h \<turnstile> list [:] Ts\<^sub>1 \<and>
              P,E,h \<turnstile> es\<^sub>2 [:] Ts\<^sub>2)

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<And>a list Ts.
       \<exists>Ts\<^sub>1 Ts\<^sub>2.
          Ts = Ts\<^sub>1 @ Ts\<^sub>2 \<and>
          (\<exists>U Us.
              Ts\<^sub>1 = U # Us \<and>
              P,E,h \<turnstile> a : U \<and>
              P,E,h \<turnstile> list [:] Us) \<and>
          P,E,h \<turnstile> es\<^sub>2 [:] Ts\<^sub>2 \<Longrightarrow>
       \<exists>U Us.
          Ts = U # Us \<and>
          P,E,h \<turnstile> a : U \<and>
          (\<exists>Ts\<^sub>1 Ts\<^sub>2.
              Us = Ts\<^sub>1 @ Ts\<^sub>2 \<and>
              P,E,h \<turnstile> list [:] Ts\<^sub>1 \<and>
              P,E,h \<turnstile> es\<^sub>2 [:] Ts\<^sub>2)
lemma [iff]: "P,E,h \<turnstile> Val v : T = (typeof\<^bsub>h\<^esub> v = Some T)"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. (P,E,h \<turnstile> Val v : T) =
    (typeof\<^bsub>h\<^esub> v = \<lfloor>T\<rfloor>)

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. (P,E,h \<turnstile> Val v : T) =
    (typeof\<^bsub>h\<^esub> v = \<lfloor>T\<rfloor>)

proof (prove)
goal (2 subgoals):
 1. P,E,h \<turnstile> Val v : T \<Longrightarrow>
    typeof\<^bsub>h\<^esub> v = \<lfloor>T\<rfloor>
 2. typeof\<^bsub>h\<^esub> v = \<lfloor>T\<rfloor> \<Longrightarrow>
    P,E,h \<turnstile> Val v : T
lemma [iff]: "P,E,h \<turnstile> Var v : T = (E v = Some T)"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. (P,E,h \<turnstile> Var v : T) = (E v = \<lfloor>T\<rfloor>)

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. (P,E,h \<turnstile> Var v : T) = (E v = \<lfloor>T\<rfloor>)

proof (prove)
goal (2 subgoals):
 1. P,E,h \<turnstile> Var v : T \<Longrightarrow> E v = \<lfloor>T\<rfloor>
 2. E v = \<lfloor>T\<rfloor> \<Longrightarrow> P,E,h \<turnstile> Var v : T
lemma [iff]: "P,E,h \<turnstile> e\<^sub>1;;e\<^sub>2 : T\<^sub>2 = (\<exists>T\<^sub>1. P,E,h \<turnstile> e\<^sub>1:T\<^sub>1 \<and> P,E,h \<turnstile> e\<^sub>2:T\<^sub>2)"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):

        P,E,h \<turnstile> e\<^sub>1 : T\<^sub>1 \<and>
        P,E,h \<turnstile> e\<^sub>2 : T\<^sub>2)

goal (2 subgoals):

    \<exists>T\<^sub>1.
       P,E,h \<turnstile> e\<^sub>1 : T\<^sub>1 \<and>
       P,E,h \<turnstile> e\<^sub>2 : T\<^sub>2
 2. \<exists>T\<^sub>1.
       P,E,h \<turnstile> e\<^sub>1 : T\<^sub>1 \<and>
       P,E,h \<turnstile> e\<^sub>2 : T\<^sub>2 \<Longrightarrow>
    P,E,h \<turnstile> e\<^sub>1;; e\<^sub>2 : T\<^sub>2

proof (prove)

 1. (P,E,h \<turnstile> {V:T; e} : T') =
    (P,E(V \<mapsto> T),h \<turnstile> e : T')

 1. (P,E,h \<turnstile> {V:T; e} : T') =
    (P,E(V \<mapsto> T),h \<turnstile> e : T')

proof (prove)
goal (2 subgoals):
 1. P,E,h \<turnstile> {V:T; e} : T' \<Longrightarrow>
    P,E(V \<mapsto> T),h \<turnstile> e : T'
 2. P,E(V \<mapsto> T),h \<turnstile> e : T' \<Longrightarrow>
    P,E,h \<turnstile> {V:T; e} : T'

inductive_cases WTrt_elim_cases[elim!]:
  "P,E,h \<turnstile> v :=e : T"
  "P,E,h \<turnstile> if (e) e\<^sub>1 else e\<^sub>2 : T"
  "P,E,h \<turnstile> while(e) c : T"
  "P,E,h \<turnstile> throw e : T"
  "P,E,h \<turnstile> try e\<^sub>1 catch(C V) e\<^sub>2 : T"
  "P,E,h \<turnstile> Cast D e : T"
  "P,E,h \<turnstile> e\<bullet>F{D} : T"
  "P,E,h \<turnstile> e\<bullet>F{D} := v : T"
  "P,E,h \<turnstile> e\<^sub>1 \<guillemotleft>bop\<guillemotright> e\<^sub>2 : T"
  "P,E,h \<turnstile> new C : T"
  "P,E,h \<turnstile> e\<bullet>M{D}(es) : T"

lemma WTrts_Val[simp]:
 "\<And>Ts. (P,E,h \<turnstile> map Val vs [:] Ts) = (map (typeof\<^bsub>h\<^esub>) vs = map Some Ts)"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<And>Ts.
       (P,E,h \<turnstile> map Val vs [:] Ts) =
       (map typeof\<^bsub>h\<^esub> vs = map Some Ts)

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<And>Ts.
       (P,E,h \<turnstile> map Val vs [:] Ts) =
       (map typeof\<^bsub>h\<^esub> vs = map Some Ts)

proof (prove)
goal (2 subgoals):
 1. \<And>Ts.
       (P,E,h \<turnstile> map Val [] [:] Ts) =
       (map typeof\<^bsub>h\<^esub> [] = map Some Ts)
 2. \<And>a vs Ts.
       (\<And>Ts.
           (P,E,h \<turnstile> map Val vs [:] Ts) =
           (map typeof\<^bsub>h\<^esub> vs = map Some Ts)) \<Longrightarrow>
       (P,E,h \<turnstile> map Val (a # vs) [:] Ts) =
       (map typeof\<^bsub>h\<^esub> (a # vs) = map Some Ts)

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<And>a vs Ts.
       (\<And>Ts.
           (P,E,h \<turnstile> map Val vs [:] Ts) =
           (map typeof\<^bsub>h\<^esub> vs = map Some Ts)) \<Longrightarrow>
       (P,E,h \<turnstile> map Val (a # vs) [:] Ts) =
       (map typeof\<^bsub>h\<^esub> (a # vs) = map Some Ts)

proof (prove)
goal (2 subgoals):
 1. \<And>a vs Ts.
       \<lbrakk>\<And>Ts.
                   (P,E,h \<turnstile> map Val vs [:] Ts) =
                   (map typeof\<^bsub>h\<^esub> vs = map Some Ts);
        Ts = []\<rbrakk>
       \<Longrightarrow> (P,E,h \<turnstile> map Val (a # vs) [:] Ts) =
                         (map typeof\<^bsub>h\<^esub> (a # vs) =
                          map Some Ts)
 2. \<And>a vs Ts aa list.
       \<lbrakk>\<And>Ts.
                   (P,E,h \<turnstile> map Val vs [:] Ts) =
                   (map typeof\<^bsub>h\<^esub> vs = map Some Ts);
        Ts = aa # list\<rbrakk>
       \<Longrightarrow> (P,E,h \<turnstile> map Val (a # vs) [:] Ts) =
                         (map typeof\<^bsub>h\<^esub> (a # vs) =
                          map Some Ts)

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<And>a vs Ts aa list.
       \<lbrakk>\<And>Ts.
                   (P,E,h \<turnstile> map Val vs [:] Ts) =
                   (map typeof\<^bsub>h\<^esub> vs = map Some Ts);
        Ts = aa # list\<rbrakk>
       \<Longrightarrow> (P,E,h \<turnstile> map Val (a # vs) [:] Ts) =
                         (map typeof\<^bsub>h\<^esub> (a # vs) =
                          map Some Ts)

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<And>Ts.
       P,E,h \<turnstile> es [:] Ts \<Longrightarrow> length es = length Ts

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<And>Ts.
       P,E,h \<turnstile> es [:] Ts \<Longrightarrow> length es = length Ts

lemma WTrt_env_mono:
  "P,E,h \<turnstile> e : T \<Longrightarrow> (\<And>E'. E \<subseteq>\<^sub>m E' \<Longrightarrow> P,E',h \<turnstile> e : T)" and
  "P,E,h \<turnstile> es [:] Ts \<Longrightarrow> (\<And>E'. E \<subseteq>\<^sub>m E' \<Longrightarrow> P,E',h \<turnstile> es [:] Ts)"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. (P,E,h \<turnstile> e : T \<Longrightarrow>
     (\<And>E'.
         E \<subseteq>\<^sub>m E' \<Longrightarrow>
         P,E',h \<turnstile> e : T)) &&&
    (P,E,h \<turnstile> es [:] Ts \<Longrightarrow>
     (\<And>E'.
         E \<subseteq>\<^sub>m E' \<Longrightarrow>
         P,E',h \<turnstile> es [:] Ts))

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. (P,E,h \<turnstile> e : T \<Longrightarrow>
     (\<And>E'.
         E \<subseteq>\<^sub>m E' \<Longrightarrow>
         P,E',h \<turnstile> e : T)) &&&
    (P,E,h \<turnstile> es [:] Ts \<Longrightarrow>
     (\<And>E'.
         E \<subseteq>\<^sub>m E' \<Longrightarrow>
         P,E',h \<turnstile> es [:] Ts))

proof (prove)
goal (21 subgoals):
 1. \<And>C E E'.
       \<lbrakk>is_class P C; E \<subseteq>\<^sub>m E'\<rbrakk>
       \<Longrightarrow> P,E',h \<turnstile> new C : Class C
 2. \<And>E e T C E'.
       \<lbrakk>P,E,h \<turnstile> e : T;
        \<And>E'.
           E \<subseteq>\<^sub>m E' \<Longrightarrow>
           P,E',h \<turnstile> e : T;
        is_refT T; is_class P C; E \<subseteq>\<^sub>m E'\<rbrakk>
       \<Longrightarrow> P,E',h \<turnstile> Cast C e : Class C
 3. \<And>v T E E'.
       \<lbrakk>typeof\<^bsub>h\<^esub> v = \<lfloor>T\<rfloor>;
        E \<subseteq>\<^sub>m E'\<rbrakk>
       \<Longrightarrow> P,E',h \<turnstile> Val v : T
 4. \<And>E V T E'.
       \<lbrakk>E V = \<lfloor>T\<rfloor>; E \<subseteq>\<^sub>m E'\<rbrakk>
       \<Longrightarrow> P,E',h \<turnstile> Var V : T
 5. \<And>E e\<^sub>1 T\<^sub>1 e\<^sub>2 T\<^sub>2 E'.
       \<lbrakk>P,E,h \<turnstile> e\<^sub>1 : T\<^sub>1;
        \<And>E'.
           E \<subseteq>\<^sub>m E' \<Longrightarrow>
           P,E',h \<turnstile> e\<^sub>1 : T\<^sub>1;
        P,E,h \<turnstile> e\<^sub>2 : T\<^sub>2;
        \<And>E'.
           E \<subseteq>\<^sub>m E' \<Longrightarrow>
           P,E',h \<turnstile> e\<^sub>2 : T\<^sub>2;
        E \<subseteq>\<^sub>m E'\<rbrakk>
       \<Longrightarrow> P,E',h \<turnstile> e\<^sub>1 \<guillemotleft>Eq\<guillemotright> e\<^sub>2 : Boolean
 6. \<And>E e\<^sub>1 e\<^sub>2 E'.
       \<lbrakk>P,E,h \<turnstile> e\<^sub>1 : Integer;
        \<And>E'.
           E \<subseteq>\<^sub>m E' \<Longrightarrow>
           P,E',h \<turnstile> e\<^sub>1 : Integer;
        P,E,h \<turnstile> e\<^sub>2 : Integer;
        \<And>E'.
           E \<subseteq>\<^sub>m E' \<Longrightarrow>
           P,E',h \<turnstile> e\<^sub>2 : Integer;
        E \<subseteq>\<^sub>m E'\<rbrakk>
       \<Longrightarrow> P,E',h \<turnstile> e\<^sub>1 \<guillemotleft>Add\<guillemotright> e\<^sub>2 : Integer
 7. \<And>E V T e T' E'.
       \<lbrakk>E V = \<lfloor>T\<rfloor>; P,E,h \<turnstile> e : T';
        \<And>E'.
           E \<subseteq>\<^sub>m E' \<Longrightarrow>
           P,E',h \<turnstile> e : T';
        P \<turnstile> T' \<le> T; E \<subseteq>\<^sub>m E'\<rbrakk>
       \<Longrightarrow> P,E',h \<turnstile> V:=e : Void
 8. \<And>E e C F T D E'.
       \<lbrakk>P,E,h \<turnstile> e : Class C;
        \<And>E'.
           E \<subseteq>\<^sub>m E' \<Longrightarrow>
           P,E',h \<turnstile> e : Class C;
        P \<turnstile> C has F:T in D; E \<subseteq>\<^sub>m E'\<rbrakk>
       \<Longrightarrow> P,E',h \<turnstile> e\<bullet>F{D} : T
 9. \<And>E e F D T E'.
       \<lbrakk>P,E,h \<turnstile> e : NT;
        \<And>E'.
           E \<subseteq>\<^sub>m E' \<Longrightarrow>
           P,E',h \<turnstile> e : NT;
        E \<subseteq>\<^sub>m E'\<rbrakk>
       \<Longrightarrow> P,E',h \<turnstile> e\<bullet>F{D} : T
 10. \<And>E e\<^sub>1 C F T D e\<^sub>2 T\<^sub>2 E'.
        \<lbrakk>P,E,h \<turnstile> e\<^sub>1 : Class C;
         \<And>E'.
            E \<subseteq>\<^sub>m E' \<Longrightarrow>
            P,E',h \<turnstile> e\<^sub>1 : Class C;
         P \<turnstile> C has F:T in D;
         P,E,h \<turnstile> e\<^sub>2 : T\<^sub>2;
         \<And>E'.
            E \<subseteq>\<^sub>m E' \<Longrightarrow>
            P,E',h \<turnstile> e\<^sub>2 : T\<^sub>2;
         P \<turnstile> T\<^sub>2 \<le> T; E \<subseteq>\<^sub>m E'\<rbrakk>
        \<Longrightarrow> P,E',h \<turnstile> e\<^sub>1\<bullet>F{D} := e\<^sub>2 : Void
A total of 21 subgoals...

proof (prove)
goal (2 subgoals):
 1. \<And>E E'.
       E \<subseteq>\<^sub>m E' \<Longrightarrow>
       P,E',h \<turnstile> [] [:] []
 2. \<And>E e T es Ts E'.
       \<lbrakk>P,E,h \<turnstile> e : T;
        \<And>E'.
           E \<subseteq>\<^sub>m E' \<Longrightarrow>
           P,E',h \<turnstile> e : T;
        P,E,h \<turnstile> es [:] Ts;
        \<And>E'.
           E \<subseteq>\<^sub>m E' \<Longrightarrow>
           P,E',h \<turnstile> es [:] Ts;
        E \<subseteq>\<^sub>m E'\<rbrakk>
       \<Longrightarrow> P,E',h \<turnstile> e # es [:] T # Ts

lemma WTrt_hext_mono: "P,E,h \<turnstile> e : T \<Longrightarrow> h \<unlhd> h' \<Longrightarrow> P,E,h' \<turnstile> e : T"
and WTrts_hext_mono: "P,E,h \<turnstile> es [:] Ts \<Longrightarrow> h \<unlhd> h' \<Longrightarrow> P,E,h' \<turnstile> es [:] Ts"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. (\<lbrakk>P,E,h \<turnstile> e : T; h \<unlhd> h'\<rbrakk>
     \<Longrightarrow> P,E,h' \<turnstile> e : T) &&&
    (\<lbrakk>P,E,h \<turnstile> es [:] Ts; h \<unlhd> h'\<rbrakk>
     \<Longrightarrow> P,E,h' \<turnstile> es [:] Ts)

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. (\<lbrakk>P,E,h \<turnstile> e : T; h \<unlhd> h'\<rbrakk>
     \<Longrightarrow> P,E,h' \<turnstile> e : T) &&&
    (\<lbrakk>P,E,h \<turnstile> es [:] Ts; h \<unlhd> h'\<rbrakk>
     \<Longrightarrow> P,E,h' \<turnstile> es [:] Ts)

lemma WT_implies_WTrt: "P,E \<turnstile> e :: T \<Longrightarrow> P,E,h \<turnstile> e : T"
and WTs_implies_WTrts: "P,E \<turnstile> es [::] Ts \<Longrightarrow> P,E,h \<turnstile> es [:] Ts"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. (P,E \<turnstile> e :: T \<Longrightarrow> P,E,h \<turnstile> e : T) &&&
    (P,E \<turnstile> es [::] Ts \<Longrightarrow>
     P,E,h \<turnstile> es [:] Ts)

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. (P,E \<turnstile> e :: T \<Longrightarrow> P,E,h \<turnstile> e : T) &&&
    (P,E \<turnstile> es [::] Ts \<Longrightarrow>
     P,E,h \<turnstile> es [:] Ts)

proof (prove)
goal (2 subgoals):
 1. \<And>E. P,E,h \<turnstile> [] [:] []
 2. \<And>E e T es Ts.
       \<lbrakk>P,E \<turnstile> e :: T; P,E,h \<turnstile> e : T;
        P,E \<turnstile> es [::] Ts; P,E,h \<turnstile> es [:] Ts\<rbrakk>
       \<Longrightarrow> P,E,h \<turnstile> e # es [:] T # Ts

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<And>E e T es Ts.
       \<lbrakk>P,E \<turnstile> e :: T; P,E,h \<turnstile> e : T;
        P,E \<turnstile> es [::] Ts; P,E,h \<turnstile> es [:] Ts\<rbrakk>
       \<Longrightarrow> P,E,h \<turnstile> e # es [:] T # Ts
